name: nativescript-nfc
description: NFC plugin for your NativeScript app

scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run build && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run build && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-nfc && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
